text:
#YearInReview: To mark #UN75, we hosted our first ever youth essay contest!
 
🥇Syke Lam discussed solar #geoengineering;🥈Ava Hanadel focused on #COVID19 #vaccine distribution; & 🥉Gulshan Ashaque talked about #healthcare, #humanrights, & #climatechange.
